{"id":1053413448,"lang":"typescript","lang_name":"TypeScript","time":"1Â month","timestamp":1695115387,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"57 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1053413448/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Find Pivot Index","memory":"48.1 MB","code":"function pivotIndex(nums: number[]): number {\n    const n = nums.length;\n    let leftsums = [0], rightsums = [0];\n    for(let i=1; i < n+1; i++) {\n        leftsums.push(nums[i-1]+leftsums[i-1]);\n        rightsums.push(nums[n-i]+rightsums[i-1]);\n    }\n    // rightsums.reverse();\n    // console.log(leftsums);\n    // console.log(rightsums);\n    for(let i=0; i <= n; i++) {\n        if(leftsums[i] == rightsums[n-(i+1)]) return i;\n    }\n    return -1;\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"find-pivot-index","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
